title: Fast and Troublefree
comment: I helped me not to install any stupid launcher and i gotta keep the original stock version of my android.

title: Nice
comment: Only recommendation would be to support icon packs. Otherwise, fast and useful.

title: Really good app
comment: Never write reviews for apps, but had to for this one. This app is simple and straightforward. Lots of power and functionality without the drama. When you replace your Google now launcher with this, you can quickly search and open apps. Really helpful if you don't want to go to the app drawer or use the so-so default task switcher to dig for the app. Nice job developer.

title: SUPER FAST APP...LIKE NO OTHER!!!!
comment: All in one.......EXCELLENT...launch and search tool...

title: Very fast. Very useful
comment: The app launches very fast, and the auto launch is an excellent option. I can't say searching for apps is a novel idea, but this is done very well. Searches only apps though. Including more options would be great too.

title: Simply perfect😊
comment: It is too small app but got a complete app search feature's like app filter some theme's and fast app details option

title: very useful app for users with numerous apps
comment: Could Use a little more features like as the IOS search widget or dash does integrating a global search.  We could even use a widget with the app.

title: So simple so fast
comment: Loved it

title: Instantly 5 stars.
comment: No bullshit, no trash. Just pure functionality at its finest. I like it.

title: Holy Smokes
comment: Amazing! Super quick and I love the auto launch feature. I prefer search to open all apps and programs with a few special exceptions that make it on my home screen.

title: Amazing
comment: This app is very useful. It's a no frill, all function utility. One of the few free apps I actually wish I could have bought.

title: Very handy tool
comment: Should be included in android by default, hats off to the developer for making our lives a lot easier!! 5 stars all the way

title: Simply does it!

title: Awesome app
comment: Searches apps at lightening speed

title: Really convenient,
comment: smart and fast
thanks

title: Causing problems lately
comment: Awesome app, used it for quite some time now but recently the app simply forgets what apps I've used and the sorting by usage gets reset at least with every reboot which makes this app a lot less useful.

title: Great
comment: Just what I was looking for. I have struggled to find apps among the many screens of them. This app is fast and very helpful. I like that you can type any letters within the name. However, one improvement: please sort the list by relevance. That is, put the apps that match the first characters of the name first.
Well done! 👏 Very helpful ;) 👍

comment: Ya

title: it works, very fast
comment: exactly what i was looking for.  It completely replaced my folder/app drawer organization.

title: Best in class, super fast

comment: Fast and smooth app drawer. If it just included the ability to search contacts, call history and sms this will be perfect

title: rev
comment: Sorting rule is not respected in android 4.4.4. You need to press 'home' to apply/reset the alphabetical rule.  EDIT - fixed in v5.6beta  1 issue remains: the app cache doesn't get refreshed automatically after its uninstallation.
can you please test v5.6 beta - should fix your problem - thanks for the feedback!

title: My best..
comment: Very very good app. Nice work in my moto g. Thanks.

title: General feedback
comment: Latest update broke sort by usage database. Just doesn't work like before. Would be 5 stars if next update included a transparency by % setting for app theme + fix for above. Otherwise, cannot live without it. Have it on all 4 of my devices.
sort by usage is fixed in 5.6 - I uploaded this as beta and hope to be able to release soon
Good apps

title: pls add
comment: hide app

title: Fast and simple, but...
comment: it would be nice to have a list layout setting as the grid layout looks cluttered when using tiny icons. Also it would be nice to have caching run in the background so I can still use the app as it seems to be caching apps every time I open it.

Hi - it should not cache every time - can you please get in contact with me to investigate the problem? ligi@ligi.de
Thanks for the feedback

title: MUST HAVE APP
comment: Indeed a must have app! I find it very peculiar that this basic app search functionality isn't part of Android by default (maybe it has something to do with patents?!). Anyway, a very convenient app. The 'Search within words' option imo should be turned off by default (the search results confused me with this option activated). A very well designed app with lots of options. An example of simplicity in app design for other app developers.

title: A must have app!!
comment: Great job done! Just something i needed to find apps installed,cheers!!

title: Very good
comment: Please provide an option to show apps as a list, and a widget allow to search without opening app would be great.
how would you suggest the widget to work? i cannot imagine how it would increase the speed of launching apps

title: Wow
comment: Great app!
thanks

title: Try
comment: And try

title: Fast Launcher
comment: This replaced my home launcher and side launcher (swipe in dock). It's so fast and convenient I wouldn't want to go back. Great - but somewhat geeky - app!

title: Great
comment: Works great as it's supposed to. Easiest way to go to all my apps. Like it a lot and one of my most used app.

title: Awesome app! Just what I was looking for.
comment: But I think there is a conflict with my TouchPal (free) keyboard, because it puts a space after the word.  The first item I tried, saying the word "Maps" results in it finding my Ulmon City Maps app, but not Google Maps, .  Same problem with saying "Pic or QuickPic" and not finding QuickPic.  This means I can't vocalize the auto launch feature as shown in the video.
there is a setting to remove the space from the query - just tick this option and your problem will vanish
Sweet swift launching goodness

title: Works great!
comment: I use Nova Launcher on my Note 2 and it does not give any way of searching in the apps drawer. If I use Google Now to search, it wouldn't find aCalandar when I searched for "cal". Now, i've set Nova to use the Fast Search Tool when I home click on the default screen, and it brings me straight to a keyboard I can quickly type what I want and actually GET the results i'm looking for!

title: Awesome App
comment: I was looking for something simple like this as the stock app drawer doesnt have a search functionality. This is fast and has nice little customizations you can make.

title: Sooooo good!
comment: All you need is speed.

title: Berrow
comment: Good

title: Fast indeed!
comment: Oh god at long last someone competent implements a fast app searcher! Thank you so much! It's cool that it requires zero permissions, by the way.

title: Super Fast!
comment: I always use this app to replace the native app drawer on my devices. Wish it could create shortcut to home screen though.
Thanks for the FeedBack! I had this shortcut-feature implemented once - unfortunately it needs a permission and the goal of FAST using 0 permissions outweighted the feature ..

title: Nice
comment: I will use it when it searches more (contacts, settings...)

title: Very nice,  1 tiny shortcoming
comment: I like this very much. Saving one star for when it can show search results in a simple list (rows, sortable perhaps). I have never found scanning icons left/right up/down efficient in my experience of interacting with Android devices.

title: Super App Launcher
comment: This app does exactly what it says it will do.  It's fast and clean,  and it works beautifully.  I highly recommend it.

title: Best Android app in the market!
